text: "Applause" is a 2013 song performed by American singer Lady Gaga. It was released for her album Artpop. It was released on August 12, 2013, a week ahead of its original release date, because it was leaked. ==Background== "Applause" is an electropop and Eurodance song. It is about being famous and applauded by fans. ==Commercial and chart performance== "Applause" reached the top five in the United States, Canada, and the UK, while reaching the top ten in several other countries. It was certified triple-platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America on May 29, 2015, for sales and streams equal to three million copies across the United States. ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Lady Gaga songs
title: Applause (Lady Gaga song)
